price: 我就惩治他和他的军队，把他们投入海中。你看看不义者的结局是怎样的。
arabic: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhnāhu wajunūdahu fanabadhnāhum fī al-yami fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-ẓālimīna
